title: Which type of metal detector can detect gold 3 feet (36 Inches) in the ground? - Quora

response.answer_text: You’d want one of the newer Pulse Inductor type of metal detector. It can go up to 2 feet beneath the ground, plus. Or go really high-end, the Minelab GPZ 7000 Gold Nugget Metal Detector. But you’ll pay $8000 for the privilege. It’s heavy (almost 7 and a half pounds). It can ONLY detect gold, nothing else. It is also a Zero Voltage detector, and works best in open areas with very little other metal trash. There is a YouTube video on it here: (from nuggethunter)  After the review, he talks about a book he wrote called “Fists Full of Gold”, but he covers the entire review before that.
There are many,many detectors with various capabilities. You can check out “Whitemetaldetectors.com” online. You’ll find what you want there…
